availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Little, Sr. (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Floyd County, Kentucky, native. Son of Edmond Little and Nellie Cardwell Little. Married to Nancy Haddix Lindon Little. Father of John Little, Joanna Little, Thomas J. Little, Eliza Little, Minerva Little, Jeremiah Little, Joseph Little, Jr., Rebecca Little, Prudence Little, and Armina Little. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 41A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 270.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, Precinct 1, p. 388A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994029, Breathitt County Births.
"Joseph Little (1815-1894)," Find A Grave, Memorial 39060606, accessed June 1, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/39060606.
"Nancy Haddix Lindon Little (1815-1905)," Find A Grave, Memorial 39060185, accessed June 2, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/39060185.
